message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'll find very useful. I'm willing to let it go for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $90 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to $120 to make this worthwhile. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $105?
I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
